mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER(email, nickname, password, user_name, gender, phone, birth, city, location) VALUES (#{email}, #{nickname}, #{password}, #{user_name}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{birth}, #{city}, #{location})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, email, nickname, password, user_name, gender, phone, birth, city, location, user_role FROM USER WHERE email = #{email}
